img_above_text:
## Black Myth: Wukong Golden Carp Location
The Golden Carp Curios item can be found in The Webbed Hollow upon defeating Yellow Loong.
img_below_text:
Goldflora Hairpin
For even more guides and tips on finding all the items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, where to find new Weapons, and all the Armor and Gear sets in the game.

img_summary: The image depicts a combat scene from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong," showcasing a battle against the character Yellow Loong. This encounter is significant as defeating Yellow Loong is necessary to obtain the Golden Carp Curios item, which is located in The Webbed Hollow. The image serves as a visual aid in a guide for players seeking to find specific items and navigate challenges within the game.
